name: Witch of the Space Station
description:
For unknown some reason, the Apollo space station is in chaos.
It's time for the alien who was used as a test subject to reveal her true identity as a witch.
All you have to do is fulfill your duties and get out of here.

Game content


・Rune magic
Defeat enemies to obtain soul shards and learn magic.
Different combinations of the four runes can create more than 20 kinds of magic.
Each magic has its own purpose. Combine up to three runes to cast the magic you need.
Use it flexibly and create your own unique fighting style.

・Apollo Space Station
Before what happened, the Apollo space station was just an ordinary space station.
This chaotic situation is no coincidence.
There may be some secret hidden behind it...

・Difficulty setting
There are three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal and Hard.
Most enemies have different moves on each difficulty level.
Enemies will have more attack pattern as the difficulty level increases.
Different difficulty will bring you a new experience.

・Restraint and escape
Most of the enemies will get excited base on the heroine's level of nudity.
When the enemy is excited, he will try to stun her and capture her.
The heroine can try to resist.
If unsuccessful, the heroine is taken away and subjected to lewd acts.
After escaping she needs to return to where she dropped the staff and pick it up. In order to get back into the fight.
Additionally, some enemies will try to knock her down and lewd acts on the spot.
Notice:
*Some enemies heroine can't resist.
*There are situations that are impossible to escape.


- Special input keys -
A special input key that can be entered at any time when the heroine is free to move.

・Ctrl + C + H
Invincible mode
*Game over due to inability to escape still exists.

・Ctrl + C + M
Unlimited mana mode

・Ctrl + C + G
Obtain 9999 soul shards
If you want all magic available immediately when the game starts, use this input key.

・Ctrl + C + O
No H mode
The heroine's clothes cannot be torn. Lewd events will not occur.

If you want to turn it off, enter the same input key again.

Guide




1. Current HP. In invincible mode, it turns red.

2. Current MP. In unlimited mana mode, it turns red.

3. Current physical condition. Only consume when resisting enemy capture.
Only restore when using a savepoint.

4. Current mental status. It changes color after every H event.
If it turns completely red, there will be no way to escape after the H event. Resulting in the game over.
In No H mode, it will not be displayed.
Only restore when using a savepoint.

5. Due to the decline in mental status, the maximum HP is reduced. The black part is the reduction amount.
Only recover when using a savepoint.

-options-

· Control
You might find the control in options. You can rebind any key except the left mouse button for normal attacks and the right mouse button for magic chanting.

・Performance mode
Improve performance by reducing fps. This is a last resort to keep the game running smoothly. Only turn it on if you think it's really necessary.
